ppahv - Why the hell would you want FLAC? It's just an uncompressed piece of crap that can't be played by anything except probably like 1 program, plus because it's uncompressed, it takes up like 10 times more than a standard 128kbs MP3. Even if I wanted anything above 320kbs for listening to music, I'd take WMA lossless file because it's the same thing but the codec is actually known to more music players.
